{"id":413520852,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 1 month","timestamp":1603751473,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/413520852/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Trapping Rain Water","memory":"15 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int trap(vector<int>& h) {\n        if(h.size() == 0) return 0;\n        int n = h.size();\n        vector<int> l(n,0),r(n,0);\n        l[0] = h.front();\n        r[n-1] = h.back();\n        int fans = 0;\n        for(int i =1;i<n;i++){\n            l[i] = max(l[i-1],h[i]);\n        }\n        for(int i =n-2;i>=0;i--){\n            r[i] = max(r[i+1],h[i]);\n        }\n        for(int i = 0;i<n;i++){\n            fans += max(min(l[i],r[i])-h[i],0);\n        }\n        return fans;\n        \n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"trapping-rain-water"}
